text: Under My Skin is a 1950 American sports drama movie directed by Jean Negulesco and based on the short story by My Old Man by Ernest Hemingway. It stars John Garfield, Micheline Presle, Noel Drayton, Luther Adler and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1950 drama movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Jean Negulesco
title: Under My Skin (movie)
